required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Anesthetics on Oxidative Stress and Apoptosis Status in Children
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Sevoflurane and Propofol on Oxidative Stress and Apoptosis Status in Children Undergoing Hypospadias Repair Surgery

lead_sponsor.agency: First Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-Sen University

clinical_study.source: First Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-Sen University

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Propofol and Sevoflurane affect the oxidative stress and apoptosis status in children undergoing hypospadias repair surgery.

primary_outcome.measure: the change of blood glutathione peroxidase(GPx) level in perioperative period
primary_outcome.time_frame: immediately after anesthetic induction, 2h and 3 days after operation

primary_outcome.measure: the change of blood-separated erythrocytes superoxide dismutase (SOD) activities in perioperative period
primary_outcome.time_frame: immediately after anesthetic induction, 2h and 3 days after operation
primary_outcome.description: the blood sample was separated and erythrocytes was obtained, superoxide dismutase activity was measured using a commercially available assay-Ransod kit (Randox Laboratories, UK).

primary_outcome.measure: the change of blood-separated erythrocytes catalase (CAT) activities in perioperative period
primary_outcome.time_frame: immediately after anesthetic induction, 2h and 3 days after operation
primary_outcome.description: the blood sample was separated and erythrocytes was obtained, catalase activity was measured using the OxiSelect catalase activity assay (Cell Biolabs, San Diego, CA, USA)

primary_outcome.measure: the change of blood-separated lymphocytes caspase-3 mRNA level in perioperative period
primary_outcome.time_frame: immediately after anesthetic induction, 2h and 3 days after operation
primary_outcome.description: Lymphocytes were separated from whole blood and freshly used for real-time PCR of caspase-3

arm_group.description: Anesthesia was induced with 8% sevoflurane with 8L/min oxygen. Anesthesia was maintained with 1-3% sevoflurane in oxygen/air mixture.
Anesthesia was induced with propofol 4mg/kg. Anesthesia was maintained with propofol 7-12mg/kg/h.

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Anesthesiology, the First-Affiliated Hospital of Sun Yat-Sen University

facility.name: The First Affiliated Hospital of Sun Yat-Sen University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: First Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-Sen University
